title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog opens without a default folder, making it inconvenient for users to locate the project files.
EB: It would be nice if the Import Project feature could remember the last folder from which I've imported a project. This would enhance user experience and efficiency.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse on XP.
2. Attempt to import an existing project.
3. Click the Browse button in the import dialog.
4. Observe the absence of a default folder in the opened dialog.
